title: Full Metal Panic! Invisible Victory
synopsis: The boisterous student Kaname Chidori and soldier Sousuke Sagara are enjoying a blissful high school life. However, their peaceful days are disrupted by the threatening terrorist organization Amalgam. Leonard Testarossa, a member of the organization who possesses "Whispered," seeks to procure Kaname and her knowledge.
related_anime: ['Full Metal Panic! The Second Raid', 'Full Metal Panic! Invisible Victory Intermission']
